chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0

Premises:
state = Map prec_list : Set
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
borne_1_0 : forall s : state, state_in_dta (M0 state) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M0 state)
state_in_dta_M0_false : forall s : state, ~ state_in_dta (M0 state) s
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
Z.le_ind : forall A : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : Z, A n -> (forall m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> A m -> A (Z.succ m)) -> forall m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> A m
Pos.peano_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Pos.peano_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
term_list_rec : forall P : term_list -> Set, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_rect : forall P : term_list -> Type, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
option_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
ClassicalFacts.boolP_ind : forall P : Prop, P -> P -> ClassicalFacts.boolP -> P
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop

```coq
intros s0 s1 H.
unfold mpl_compat.
intros c p0 p1 H0 H1.
apply H.
exact H0.
exact H1.
Qed.
```

original: intros s0 s1 H. unfold mpl_compat. intros c p0 p1 H0 H1. apply H. apply H0. apply H1.
